full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGRUB THABS DREGS PA KUN 'DUL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGRUB THABS TSIG NYUNG LA DON CHA TSANG BA TSIGS BCAD DU SDEBS PA 'DI 'DRA ZHIG DGOS ZHES, DKON MCHOG BLA MAR 'DZIN CING DAD PA DANG GTONG BA LA SOGS PA DAM PAS BSNGAGS PA'I YON TAN DANG LDAN PA DUR BED WANG PHUN TSOGS BSAM GRUB KYI DBON MO NOR BU R'A GAS NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, KU S'A LI DHARMA BADZRA GYIS AOR DU SU WANG GI HO RO'I SGAR THOG TU THUN GCIG LA MGYOGS PAR SBYAR BA'O,, ,, AOm SVA STI, ,TSUL 'DI DGE SLONG THABS MKHAS RGYA MTSO YIS, ,CHOS SDE BDE CHEN LHUN GRUB GLING MCHOG TU, ,RGYA RKYEN SBYAR DE DPAR DU BZHENGS PA'I DGES, ,'GRO KUN BLA MED BYANG CHEN MYUR THOB SHOG ,CES SH'AS DHA RAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O,, ,,
